page.title: 08DEVIZES FAIR.
page.content: Devizes Fair comes to the town three times a year and is situated on the Green and sometimes near the Crammer. We have 'Jennings' Fair living quite close to us but most of the year it is travelling around the country. The Fair comes usually for the first two months in the year and at Carnival time,when it is near the Crammer because the Carnival is on the Green. It also comes home to Devizes for the winter. There are lots of rides including the 'Super Trouper','Invader'and the 'Meteor'.There are also less scarey ones like the 'Ladybirds','Helter Skelter'and the 'Roundabouts'. Most of the rides are 30p but some are 50p. There is always an exciting atmosphere at the Fair, and the smell of hot dogs and candyfloss abounds.
